( Carnage: I apologize for not posting for a bit, I am always at my grandmothers and I have already said that I must look after her for reason that she is ill. Again I apologize and will post when I can. Thank you.)

* Carnage watched Teltoli fly off towards the Ark, she then looked at the surrounding forest and it's shadows. She sighed as she then began to move off towards the high mountains in which Teltoli had motioned to earlier, perhaps she was meant to deal with this alone?
Carnage disappeared into the shadows of the trees, perhaps.*
